tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great doctor. I was very apprehensive to undergo my implant removal surgery as a couple of doctors only spoke about the cons of removing it after years. Dr Arun was very polite and he listened to every question i had. The surgery was very successful and the healing was sooner than expected. I was able to get back to work sooner than expected. Now my entire family consults only him for ortho issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was very useful consultation. Doctor guided us in a ver good way. Doctor explained peacefully to our quiries.
But the the person sitting in cash counter doesn't have any knowledge to which X-RAY he has to collect the bill. And not active. Delayed our process very much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Neck and Spine Biopsy,Neck Pain Treatment,
review:
Doctor listened patiently to my explanation on my problem, pain and it's effects on me, so that he identifies the actual issue.
Then he gave prescription and educated me about the issue and the solution for it.
He answered me for all my questions without any hesitation and cleared all my doubts using the medical terms known to me.
reply_text: THANKs a million for your positive feedback, Much appreciate it

review: Dr. Arun Kumar patiently listened to my problems and reviewed my medical reports. His articulation on the nature of the problem was very good. It gave me confidence that I am in safe hands. Instead of jumping into medication, he said my problem ican be resolved through the physio route. Hope it works.

Right from early consultation, during surgery and post surgery doctor was very excellent in providing great consultation, explained to us very well on rehabilitation procedures of our queries, very easily approachable and highly responsive in nature. Highly recommended doctor.. Thanks.
